eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A BLUE ALERT FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Vermont; AT 12:04 PM ON NOV 13, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:04 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: THIS IS A TEST. Vermont BLUE Alert system TEST. THIS IS ONLY A TEST. No action is required. THIS IS A TEST of the Vermont BLUE Alert system.
